title: The Slaves of Jedikiah: Part 1
description: A teenage boy, Stephen Jameson, collapses in the street while being observed by three other youngsters-John, Carol and Kenny-who communicate with each other telepathically.Later, Carol contacts Stephen at the hospital and informs him he has broken out as one of the Tomorrow People, the next stage of human evolution.However, he has also come to the attention of others.

title: The Slaves of Jedikiah: Part 2
description: Stephen has been abducted from the hospital by Ginger and Lefty, who take him to the mysterious Jedikiah. John, Carol and Kenny attempt to locate him and get him safely back to the lab.

title: The Slaves of Jedikiah: Part 3
description: Stephen, now under Jedikiah's control, has let Ginger and Lefty into the lab where they are soon joined by Jedikiah.John and Carol realise TIM has been deactivated and attempted to return to the lab, only to find Jedikiah has set up a forcefield which leaves them trapped in hyperspace.

title: The Slaves of Jedikiah: Part 4
description: John, Carol and Stephen recover to find Jedikiah has left, taking Kenny with him. They follow them back to the mansion in order to perform a rescue only to discover Jedikiah has set a trap for them.

title: The Slaves of Jedikiah: Part 5
description: John and Stephen jaunt up to Cyclops' spaceship in an attempt to rescue Kenny, Ginger and Lefty. There they finally meet the Cyclops and discover the real reason why he wants telepaths.

title: The Medusa Strain: Part 1
description: Jedikiah is recovered from space by Count Rabowski, who is already holding prisoner Peter, one of the Time Guardians. Jedikiah tricks Peter into transporting them to the 20th century so he can get his revenge on the Tomorrow People.

title: The Medusa Strain: Part 2
description: Carol and Stephen jaunt to the Tower of London where they encounter Jedikiah. Jedikiah takes Carol back to Robowski's spaceship with him, hoping to use her as leverage with Peter.

title: The Medusa Strain: Part 3
description: With Carol threatened, Peter is forced to reopen the passageway to the 20th century.Jedikiah sends Robowski to the lab to capture the other Tomorrow People.Meanwhile, John and Stephen try to find a way onto the ship to rescue their friends.

title: The Medusa Strain: Part 4
description: TIM jaunts John and Stephen back to the lab where Kenny attempts to revive them.Meanwhile, Jedikiah forces Peter to take them back to the 20th century one last time.

title: The Vanishing Earth: Part 1
description: The Tomorrow People investigate a series of natural disasters which are threatening the entire planet. Meanwhile, Ginger and Lefty take a day trip to Clacton and encounter a sinister pier attraction.

title: The Vanishing Earth: Part 2
description: Ginger is brainwashed by the mysterious Spidron, who puts him to work in his mine operation. Meanwhile, Stephen and Lefty return to the pier in search of their friend.

title: The Vanishing Earth: Part 3
description: John and Carol return to the lab where they find Stephen has been returned safely but no-one has any memory of what has happened. Meanwhile, Steen returns to the pier to continue his investigation into Spidron.

title: The Vanishing Earth: Part 4
description: The Tomorrow People and Steen must find a way to save the workers trapped in Spidron's collapsing mine workings. Then they must track down Spidron and Sandor and stop them escaping or the entire Earth will be destroyed.

title: The Blue and the Green: An Apple for the Teacher
description: John and Stephen find themselves with two mysteries to investigate-the possibility that Stephen's new teacher Elizabeth M'Bondo is a Tomorrow Person and some worryingly accurate paintings of alien planets.

title: The Blue and the Green: A Changing Picture
description: John and Stephen follow Liz into hyperspace, where they manage to rescue her and return her to the lab. Convinced of their story, she agrees to help them investigate the paintings, which seem to induce violence in those around them.

title: The Blue and the Green: The Trojan Horse
description: John and Stephen rescue Liz from the youths and find out about the second painting. John buys it from a man who turns out to Robert's grandfather and takes it back to the lab, only to find out it may be a trap.

title: The Blue and the Green: Cuckoo in the Nest
description: John is being held prisoner by Robert in the cellar of the antique shop, unable to use his powers.Chris attempts to rescue him but only succeeds in getting himself in trouble with the police.

title: The Blue and the Green: The Swarming Season
description: Robert explains to John that his race use violent energy as a power source.If they stay on Earth they will die but the violence needed to power their departure will complete destroy Earth's civilisation.

title: A Rift in Time: Vase of Mystery
description: John and Stephen both begin having dreams about Peter and realise he is asking for help.But first they must track down a Roman vase that also appeared in the dream.

title: A Rift in Time: Turn of the Thumb
description: Stephen is transported to the Hall of the Time Guardians where he meets Zenon, Peter's grandfather.Peter has become lost in the past and his only hope of rescue lies with the Tomorrow People.

title: A Rift in Time: From Little Acorns...
description: John, Liz and Chris plan an attack on the gladiator training school to try and rescue Stephen and Peter.But none of them has realised Gaius' true nature.

title: A Rift in Time: Rise of the Roman Empire
description: History has been altered and the Roman Empire now encompasses half the galaxy. The Tomorrow People and their friends must return to the past to put things right but Gaius is in hot pursuit.

title: The Doomsday Men: Dressed to Kill
description: A new peace treaty is about to be signed but the Tomorrow People are worried about the Doomsday Men, an organisation dedicated to the perpetuation of war. Stephen is sent undercover at the same school as the grandson of the group's leader.

title: The Doomsday Men: The Burning Sword
description: Stephen earns the respect of Douglas and the others and is invited to join the Doomsday Men.Meanwhile, an accident at the Damocles space station leaves an astronaut in danger so the Tomorrow People decide to intervene.

title: The Doomsday Men: Run Rabbit Run
description: The Damocles is in the hands of the Doomsday Men and the Tomorrow People are powerless to act-any attempt at intervention and McLelland will throw the dead man's switch and launch nuclear missiles towards the Earth.

title: The Doomsday Men: The Shuttlecock
description: Stephen and Paul suspect Laird is involved in Douglas' kidnapping and follow him, only to learn the whole incident was set up by the Doomsday Men.Stephen matters transports both boys back to the lab where the Tomorrow People try to convince them to help them stop McLelland.

title: Secret Weapon: Lost & Found
description: John, Liz and Stephen sense the breakout of a new Tomorrow Person, Tyso Boswell. Unknown to them, however, he has already come to the attention of Professor Cawston, who introduces him to the mysterious Colonel Masters.

title: Secret Weapon: Not Quite a Sleeping Beauty
description: Cawston agrees to help the Tomorrow People find Tyso and introduces Stephen to Masters. However, as soon as Masters takes him away John and Liz lose contact with him.

title: Secret Weapon: Whose Side Are You on Professor
description: Masters is now aware of the Tomorrow People's existence and is determined to harness their powers. He tries to recruit Cawston to his cause, revealing the true fate of Stephen and Tyso.

title: Secret Weapon: A Present from Russia
description: TIM summons Chris to the lab where he is able to cure John. With the rest of their friends being held prisoner, Chris comes up with a novel way to thwart Masters' plans.

title: Worlds Away: Secret of the Pyramid
description: The Tomorrow People are visited by Timus, an ambassador from the Galactic Federation. He tells them of the planet Pyrie, where telepaths are oppressed by the servants of the alien Khultan, and asks them to go there to help them.

title: Worlds Away: Hound of the Night
description: The Tomorrow People meet up with Tikno, the clone brother of Timus who is on Pyrie for the same reason as them. He takes John and Stephen to meet the local telepaths, the Vesh, to try and persuade them to join forces.

title: Worlds Away: More for the Burning
description: Liz, Tyso and Lenda have been captured by the Veshtakers and sentenced to burning. While Stephen and Arkron try to rescue them, John, Tikno and the Vesh infiltrate the Khultan's pyramid in an attempt to restore everyone's powers.

title: A Man for Emily: The Fastest Gun
description: A group of aliens stop off on Earth for supplies. But since their only knowledge of Earth's culture comes from watching cowboy films, it is not long before their visit results in violence and the Tomorrow People become involved.

title: A Man for Emily: Here We Go Round the Doozlum
description: The Tomorrow People attempt to rescue Elmer from the police and return him to the ship, otherwise his family will destroy Earth in retaliation.

title: A Man for Emily: Shotgun Wedding
description: The Tomorrow People persuade the British authorities to turn Elmer over to them so they can return him to the ship, but unknown to them Emily has plans for John.

title: The Revenge of Jedikiah: Curse of the Mummy's Tomb
description: When one of his colleagues goes missing after an expedition to Egypt, Professor Cawston goes to the Tomorrow People for help. They soon realise the expedition unearthed Jedikiah, who is attempting to track them down.

title: The Revenge of Jedikiah: Last Chance
description: Tricia takes Jedikiah to the EWE, where he kills Colonel Masters. As a result, the EWE start hunting for the Tomorrow People.

title: The Revenge of Jedikiah: Farewell Performance
description: John and Liz are on life support at the EWE and their only hope of recovery lies with Stephen and Tyso. But Cawston refuses to let them go to them, afraid one of them might be Jedikiah.

title: One Law: One Law for the Poor
description: John, Liz, Stephen and Tyso return to Earth to see if any more Tomorrow People have broken out in their absence.They sense the presence of another telepath, Mike Bell, and decide to leave him to break out in his own time.Unfortunately, his abilities have already brought him to the attention of some criminals.

title: One Law: Another for the Rich
description: Lord Dunning takes Mike's family prisoner in order to force him to use his powers in his service. Meanwhile, John, Liz and Stephen attempt to discover his whereabouts by interrogating Slow and Two Tone.

title: One Law: Which Prohibits Them Equally from Stealing Bread
description: John, Liz and Stephen are able to secure Mike's release but are unable to prosecute Dunning without revealing the Tomorrow People's existence. However, Mike then goes to Dunning and offers him a partnership.

title: Into the Unknown: The Visitor
description: A spaceship is detected near Earth and John and Stephen join aboard to collect the pilot, Kwaan, who has been injured. However, when Mike goes up to the ship on his own it results in several of the Tomorrow People being trapped on board.

title: Into the Unknown: The Father-Ship
description: Liz manages to jaunt aboard the scout ship with a portable version of TIM. When the ship docks with the main vessel, the group discover that a rebellion has deposed Tirayaan.

title: Into the Unknown: The Tunnel
description: Timus arrives at the lab and he and Tyso try to find a way to rescue the other Tomorrow People and their allies, who have been abandoned on the scout ship as it is drawn into the hole in space.

title: Into the Unknown: The Circle
description: The scout ship manages to emerge from the tunnel back into normal space. Unfortunately, the ship then comes under attack from Vektaan, who is determined to destroy them.

title: The Dirtiest Business: A Spy Is Born
description: The lab is invaded by the SIS, who inform the Tomorrow People that Pavla, a telepathic girl working for the KGB, has gone missing in London.The Tomorrow People must try to protect her from the intelligence agencies of two countries.

title: The Dirtiest Business: A Spy Dies...
description: Mike manages to escape from the KGB but Pavla is taken back to the embassy as a prisoner.John and Mike attempt a rescue but to their surprise Pavla refuses to go with them.

title: A Much Needed Holiday: Spilled Porridge
description: The Tomorrow People are taking a holiday on the planet Galia-but when they come across two runaway slave boys, it becomes clear there is more going on than they first suspected.

title: A Much Needed Holiday: Just Desserts
description: Timus arrives on Galia and confirms he was aware of the Klepton enslaving the natives.Since the Federation will not agree to direct intervention, it is up to the Tomorrow People to free them.

title: The Heart of Sogguth: Beat the Drum
description: A stranger, Jake, offers to manage Mike's band.But when Liz learns that he is the leader of a religious group, the Hearts of Sogguth, she begins to wonder what his motives are.

title: The Heart of Sogguth: Devil in Disguise
description: Jake sends John to kill Liz but being forced to go against the Tomorrow People's nature causes him to return to normal.John and Liz realise that if Mike plays Sogguth's drum on live television then Sogguth will be released into the world.

title: The Lost Gods: Flight of Fancy
description: John and Mike are trying out John's new hand glider when Mike starts having visions of an Asian girl.They soon realize she is Hsui Tai, a new Tomorrow Person and the living goddess of a group of monks-who sacrifice their gods when they come of age.

title: The Lost Gods: Life Before Death
description: Mike finds himself transported to the temple in the middle of Hsui Tai's sacrifice.There he is hailed as the god Kishnu...and scheduled to be sacrificed alongside Hsui Tai.

title: Hitler's Last Secret: Men Like Rats
description: Nazi uniforms are the latest fashion craze being worn by Britain's youths, including Mike. Things grow even more disturbing when John is asked to investigate the death of a boy in Nazi uniform in Germany and learns he was an SS cadet who hadn't aged in over thirty years.

title: Hitler's Last Secret: Seeds of Destruction
description: Hitler has been revived from suspended animation, ready to take advantage of conditioning that will make everyone obey him. John and Hsui Tai join Major Hughes in a raid on his bunker to try and stop him making a broadcast that will bring the nations' youths under his control.

title: The Thargon Menace: Unexpected Guests
description: A Thargon slimship crash lands on a Pacific island under the control of the infamous dictator General Papa Minn.The Tomorrow People go to investigate and the crew claim they are on the run from Thargon slavers.

title: The Thargon Menace: Playing with Fire
description: Flyn and Sula join up with Papa Minn, who agrees to help them construct a powerful ripple ray.John jaunts aboard the Thargon government ship, whose crew give a very different account of their quarry's nature.

title: Castle of Fear: Ghosts and Monsters
description: The Tomorrow People all have dreams about a headless Highlander and suspect a new Tomorrow Person is breaking out.This is Andrew Forbes, a boy with the power to create illusions...but his father is far from pleased with his new abilities.

title: Castle of Fear: Fighting Spirit
description: Mike and Hsui Tai track down Andrew but he is so scared by recent experiences that he uses his illusions to escape from them.The Tomorrow People manage to convince Bruce and Angus of their good intentions and go in search of Andrew but he sends an army of illusions to stop them.

title: Achilles Heel: A Room at the Inn
description: When an alien spaceship crashes into a satellite, John, Liz and Mike go to investigate. Meanwhile, two of its occupants, Yagon and Cantor, check into Bruce Forbes' hotel searching for a mineral that robs telepaths of their powers.

title: Achilles Heel: Everything to Lose
description: John, Liz and Mike jaunt to Glip's ship but when Yagon and Cantor return they use the barlumin to disable them. The only hope of stopping their plans lies with Andrew and Hsui Tai, but the barlumin has already robbed them of their powers.

title: The Living Skins: A Harmless Fashion
description: A shopping trip sees Mike and Hsui Tai purchasing the new bubbleskin jumpsuits. When they subsequently began experiencing strange behaviour, the other Tomorrow People wonder if there is more to the new fashion craze than meets the eye.

title: The Living Skins: Cold War
description: Mike comes to Andrew's rescue and manages to stun John and Liz, who are now under the control of the bubbleskins.But when they discover John's suit has already begun to detach, they wonder if they could be on the way to a solution.

title: War of the Empires: Close Encounter
description: Liz has travelled to the Trig to join Timus in negotiating a peace between the Sorsons and the Thargons.But they are unsuccessful and soon both races are encroaching on Earth's solar system.

title: War of the Empires: Contact!
description: John and Mike manage to evade the crossfire as the Thargon ship is destroyed. The Sorsons land on Earth where Vishishnu contacts the President about an alliance.

title: War of the Empires: Standing Alone
description: Andrew heads to the White House and manages to rescue Mike and Hsui Tai.On hearing John is being held by the Federation, the trio decide to steal a Sorson ship to rescue him.

title: War of the Empires: All in the Mind
description: John and Liz contact the Thargons who agree to leave Earth if they find no evidence of Sorsons being there.However, the President orders a pre-emptive strike against them.
